CustomField.description: If first extension then calculated as Completed Extension Date - 60 days prior to Original Asset Maturity Date. If the Property Extension Created Date < 60 days prior to Original Asset Maturity Date then use Extension Created Date. Any extension after first calculated as Extension Completed Date - Previous Asset Maturity Date. If Property Extension Created Date < Previous Asset Maturity Date then use Property Extension Created Date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If first extension then calculated as Completed Extension Date - 60 days prior to Original Asset Maturity Date. If the Property Extension Created Date < 60 days prior to Original Asset Maturity Date then use Extension Created Date. Any extension after first calculated as Extension Completed Date - Previous Asset Maturity Date. If Property Extension Created Date < Previous Asset Maturity Date then use Property Extension Created Date.
CustomField.label: Days To Resolve
